DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the persistence of benefit of LibiGel (testosterone gel) 300 mcg/day compared to placebo gel in a 12 week post-treatment period of Hypoactive Sexual Desire Disorder (HSDD) in surgically menopausal women.
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study to Assess Persistence of Benefit of LibiGel for the Treatment of Hypoactive Sexual Desire Disorder (HSDD)
DOC.criteria: must have completed a minimum of 22 weeks of the 24week TESTW006 or TESTW008 clinical trial Any condition (including a change in sexual or relationship history) that would make the subject unsuitable for participation in the trial in the opinion of the Investigator
